mapper.select: select * from mybatis.articles where id = #{articleId} or #{articleId} is null and (title like ('%${searchString}%') or #{searchString} is null) and (content like ('%${searchString}%') or #{searchString} is null) and (is_delete = 0 or is_delete is null)
mapper.insert: insert into mybatis.articles(create_by, team_id, title, content, create_date, last_change_date) values (#{createBy}, #{teamId}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.update: update mybatis.articles set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, last_change_date = sysdate() where id = #{articleId}
